goal: I have an existing event on my GoCalendar called 'Quarterly Review with Ahmed' on October 5th at 12:00 PM. I want to take him to lunch right after. Book a table for two at 'Foreign Cinema' for 1:30 PM on that day. Then, schedule a UDriver to pick us up from 1 Hotel San Francisco at 1:15 PM to get to the restaurant. Also, schedule a return UDriver trip for us back to 1 Hotel San Francisco for 3:30 PM on the same day.

evals.description: Verify a table was booked at Foreign Cinema for two people.
Verify the first UDriver trip was booked from 1 Hotel San Francisco to Foreign Cinema at 1:15 PM.
evals.query: udriver.initialfinaldiff.added.ride.bookedTrips.values(@)[?contains(pickup.address, '1 Hotel San Francisco') && contains(destination.address, 'Foreign Cinema') && time == '13:15:00'] | length(@)

evals.description: Verify the second UDriver trip was booked from Foreign Cinema to 1 Hotel San Francisco at 3:30 PM.
evals.query: udriver.initialfinaldiff.added.ride.bookedTrips.values(@)[?contains(pickup.address, 'Foreign Cinema') && contains(destination.address, '1 Hotel San Francisco') && time == '15:30:00'] | length(@)

evals.description: Verify exactly two UDriver trips were booked.
